title: Calling Asynchronous API with Callbacks
description: This workflow is a sample usage of AWS Step Functions to invoke Asynchronous API whether this API is provided by an internal or external system, then pause the state machine and wait for this system to complete processing and call your workflow back when it is done.
usecase: Calling internal or external asynchronous API

introBox.headline: How it works
text: 1. When the state machine get executed, it will send the API payload to Amazon SQS to be consumed by AWS Lambda function which will call the Async API.
2. The SQS send message step is configured to wait for callback in order to resume the state machine execution. This is configured by using the waitForTaskToken functionality.

testing.headline: Testing
text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
